CustomField.formula:
Sales_Price_incl_Targeting__c * IF (ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, 'CPM'),Quantity__c/1000, Quantity__c) * (1 - Rate_Card_Discount_percent__c) * (1- Rate_Discount_I__c) * (1- Rate_Discount_II__c) * (1- Special_Agency_Discount_shadow__c)
/* IF(ISBLANK(Package_Line_Item__c), Sales_Price_incl_Targeting__c * IF (ISPICKVAL(Billing_Category__c, 'CPM'),Quantity__c/1000, Quantity__c)* (1 - Rate_Card_Discount_percent__c) * (1- Rate_Discount_I__c) * (1- Rate_Discount_II__c) * (1- Special_Agency_Discount_shadow__c), 0) */
CustomField.label: Discounted Amount
